Set zoom

Type Definitions

defaultOptions

Type:
  • Object
Properties:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
enabled Boolean <optional>
 true Zoom is enabled
enableWhenNoActiveTool Boolean <optional>
 true Allow to move canvas when no object is selected and is no active tool.
enableButton Boolean <optional>
 true Add "move canvas" button to settings toolbar
showZoomTooltip Boolean <optional>
 true Show tooltip with current zoom value on any change of zoom props
enableMove Boolean <optional>
 true Enable move of canvas
useWheelEvents Boolean <optional>
 true Attach wheel events
moveCanvasOnWheel Boolean <optional>
 true Change center of viewport on wheel events depending on mouse position.
moveCanvasOnWheelStep Number <optional>
 0 Attach wheel events. Valid range of value is from 0(center of viewport will not changed) to 1(center of viewport will move to mouse position). Most comfortable value is 0.05-0.15
zoomStep Number <optional>
 1.05 Step of each zoom change. (1.05 = 105%)
defaultZoom Number <optional>
 1 Default zoom value
minZoom Number <optional>
 1 Min zoom value
maxZoom Number <optional>
 32 Max zoom value
Source:
  • plugins/feature-zoom/Zoom.js, line 30
